key_risks: Regulatory and compliance risks due to evolving banking laws and rising interest rates
Cybersecurity threats including phishing, data breaches, and ransomware attacks
Economic sensitivity tied to regional economic conditions, particularly in real estate and small business lending
Competitive pressures from larger national banks, regional banks, and fintech startups
social_issues: Commitment to ESG initiatives, including sustainable lending practices and community development programs
governance_issues: Ongoing regulatory scrutiny and compliance costs
